long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jira RTL Fixer is a lightweight browser extension designed to improve the user experience for teams using right-to-left (RTL) languages like Farsi in Jira. The extension automatically detects RTL text in issue descriptions, comments, and summaries, and applies appropriate text direction and styling to ensure better readability and alignment.

Features:
Automatically fixes RTL issues in Jira's interface, including issue descriptions, comments, and summaries.
Seamlessly applies text direction and styling without requiring manual adjustments.
Supports both light and dark themes, adapting to your browser's theme settings.
Toggle the extension on or off with a simple switch, allowing flexible control.
Lightweight and easy to use â€” no additional setup required.
Enhance your Jira experience when working with RTL content by ensuring proper text alignment and appearance!
